title: A Toddler's Airport Conveyor Belt Adventure & America's Crippling Student Loan Crisis | Andrew Yang
itunes:title: A Toddler's Airport Conveyor Belt Adventure & America's Crippling Student Loan Crisis | Andrew Yang
description:
A toddler takes a ride on an airport conveyor belt, student debt reaches devastating levels in the U.S., and Andrew Yang discusses his 2020 Democratic presidential campaign.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
